    • Constructor Detail

      • Arena

        public Arena(java.lang.String name,
             ArenaStatus status,
             int minPlayers,
             int maxPlayers,
             org.bukkit.Location duckSpawn,
             org.bukkit.Location hunterSpawn,
             org.bukkit.Location spectatorSpawn,
             java.util.List<org.bukkit.Location> checkpoints)
        Initialize a New Arena.
        Parameters:
        name - The Name of the Arena.
        status - The Status of the Arena.
        minPlayers - The Minimum Players needed for the Arena to Start.
        maxPlayers - The Maximum Players allowed at once in the Arena.
        duckSpawn - The Duck Spawn Location.
        hunterSpawn - The Hunter Spawn Location.
        spectatorSpawn - The Spectator Spawn Location.
        checkpoints - The Checkpoints of the Arena.

      • broadcast

        public void broadcast(java.lang.String message,
                      Team team,
                      org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Parameters:
        message - The Message to send to the Players.
        team - The Team of to Broadcast to. Set to Team.None if you want to talk to Every Player in the Arena regardless of Team.
        player - The Player the Message is About. Use null if you want to talk About the players we're broadcasting to instead of just one Specific Player.
